
::: {style="font-size: 14pt;font-weight: bold;margin-bottom: 10px; margin-top: 20px"}
NASDAQ Weekly % Change Relative to Start of Year
:::


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

# Load libraries
library(quantmod)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)

# Define the current year for dynamic filtering
current_year <- 2025

# 1. Get NASDAQ data
# Note: Ideally this should start earlier (e.g. 2007) so 2008 has a baseline, 
# but for this script we will handle the missing baseline gracefully.
df_hist_xts <- getSymbols("^IXIC", 
                          from = "2008-01-01", 
                          to = "2025-12-31",
                          src = "yahoo", 
                          auto.assign = FALSE)

# 2. Define Baselines (Closing Price of Previous Year)
# Official YTD is calculated vs the Close of Dec 31st of the PRIOR year.
yearly_ends <- endpoints(df_hist_xts, on = "years")

# We grab the close prices of year ends and shift the Year label +1 
# (e.g., 2024's Close becomes 2025's Baseline)
df_baselines <- data.frame(
  Year = as.numeric(format(index(df_hist_xts[yearly_ends]), "%Y")) + 1, 
  Baseline_Price = coredata(df_hist_xts[yearly_ends, "IXIC.Adjusted"])
)

# 3. Prepare "Natural" Weeks (1-52)
# We exclude the glitchy "Week 1" at year end and "Week 53" (which we build manually)
weekly_idx <- endpoints(df_hist_xts, on = "weeks")
df_weekly <- data.frame(Date = index(df_hist_xts[weekly_idx]), 
                        coredata(df_hist_xts[weekly_idx])) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.numeric(format(Date, "%Y")), 
         Week = as.numeric(format(Date, "%V"))) %>%
  filter(Week <= 52, !(format(Date, "%m") == "12" & Week == 1))

# 4. Prepare "Year End" (Week 53)
# We force the exact last trading day of the year into a "Week 53" bucket
yearly_idx <- endpoints(df_hist_xts, on = "years")
df_yearend <- data.frame(Date = index(df_hist_xts[yearly_idx]), 
                         coredata(df_hist_xts[yearly_idx])) %>%
  mutate(Year = as.numeric(format(Date, "%Y")), 
         Week = 53)

# 5. Join and Calculate % Change
df_hist <- bind_rows(df_weekly, df_yearend) %>%
  left_join(df_baselines, by = "Year") %>%
  arrange(Year, Week) %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  mutate(
    # If 2008 doesn't have a 2007 baseline, use the first price available
    Baseline_Price = ifelse(is.na(Baseline_Price), first(IXIC.Adjusted), Baseline_Price),
    # Official YTD Calculation
    change_from_year_start = ((IXIC.Adjusted / Baseline_Price) - 1) * 100
  ) %>%
  ungroup()

# 6. Prepare Plot Data
df_historical_plain <- df_hist %>% filter(Year < current_year)
df_current_year <- df_hist %>% filter(Year == current_year)

df_avg_historical <- df_historical_plain %>%
  group_by(Week) %>%
  summarise(avg_change = mean(change_from_year_start, na.rm = TRUE))

# --- STEP E: Plotting ---
p <- plot_ly()

# Historical Years
p <- add_trace(p, 
               data = df_hist_plain,
               x = ~Week, 
               y = ~change_from_year_start,
               type = 'scatter', 
               mode = 'lines', 
               split = ~Year, 
               line = list(color = 'grey', width = 1),
               opacity = 0.3,
               hoverinfo = "text",
               text = ~paste("Year:", Year, "<br>Week:", Week, "<br>Change:", round(change_from_year_start, 1),"%"),
               showlegend = FALSE)

# Current Year
if(nrow(df_curr_year) > 0) {
  p <- add_trace(p, 
                 data = df_curr_year,
                 x = ~Week, 
                 y = ~change_from_year_start,
                 type = 'scatter', 
                 mode = 'lines',
                 line = list(color = '#336699', width = 3),
                 name = as.character(current_year),
                 hoverinfo = "text",
                 text = ~paste("Year:", Year, "<br>Week:", Week, "<br>Change:", round(change_from_year_start, 1),"%"))
}

# Average Line
p <- add_trace(p, 
               data = df_avg,
               x = ~Week, 
               y = ~avg_change,
               type = 'scatter', 
               mode = 'lines',
               line = list(color = 'darkred', width = 2, dash = 'dot'),
               name = "Average 2018-2024",
               hoverinfo = "text",
               text = ~paste("Average", "<br>Week:", Week, "<br>Change:", round(avg_change, 1),"%"))

# Layout
p <- p %>% layout(
  xaxis = list(
    title = "Week",
    range = c(0.5, 53.5),
    showgrid = FALSE,
    tickvals = c(1, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50),
    ticktext = c("1", "10", "20", "30", "40", "50")
  ),
  yaxis = list(title = "% Change", showgrid = TRUE, gridcolor = "#e5e5e5"),
  showlegend = TRUE,
  legend = list(orientation = "h", y = 1.1),
  plot_bgcolor = "white"
) %>% config(displayModeBar = FALSE)

p
```
